headline: Ask HN: Why are trolls down voting my questions?
description:
Just recently, was asking why someone found something exciting. Why are people down voting these questions?

The subject was https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31084312 [https://www.assemblyai.com/blog/how-dall-e-2-actually-works/], someone had stated they were excited and I asked why, I got downvotes instead of answers.

Is the HN crowd unable to have a discussion? Can we get these down votes overturned?

I deleted the queries, they were obviously attracting negative emotions, I wish I could downvote people for being petty...
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么巨魔对我的问题投了反对票？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼巨魔對我的問題投了反對票？
description_zh-Hans:
就在最近，正在问为什么有人发现了一些令人兴奋的东西。为什么人们对这些问题投了下票？

主题是https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31084312 [https://www.assemblyai.com/blog/how-dall-e-2-actually-works/]，有人曾表示他们很兴奋，我问为什么，我得到的是下票而不是答案。

HN的人群是不是无法进行讨论？我们能不能让这些降票被推翻？

我删除了这些查询，它们显然吸引了负面的情绪，我希望我可以为小气的人降票。
